ygData.subject: Re: 1.14 & 3.2 java.net.SocketException: Socket is closed issue
ygData.msgSnippet: I m facing the same issue, I m seeing hundreds of SEVERE: close() ros[ToeThread #... messages when using Java 8. Does anybody has any idea how to solve this?
